      • Test_ArrayList_Functionality

        public static boolean Test_ArrayList_Functionality()
        This demonstrates how arrayList functions with regard to Identity and Value and other items such as removing what is not there, adding the same reference object twice and then removing. The functionality has progressed as this program was developed, so it is now used to give a complex add and remove sequence. If the test does not throw an error, it is valid.
        Returns:
